intro: Koichi, who has gained the ability to transform, creates a special graduation album as part of the photography club...!
description:
◆Story
Koichi, who loves taking photos, is unfortunately involved in a traffic accident on the day of his school's entrance ceremony.
When he wakes up in the hospital, he encounters a mysterious mushroom(?) that calls itself a yokai and gains the ability to transform.

After being discharged from the hospital, Koichi unknowingly gets appointed as the school photographer. He then establishes a photography club and begins capturing the school's events.

Thinking that simply taking photos would be boring, Koichi decides to use his transformation ability...
He attempts to take photos from places that would normally be impossible to access, but his transformations often wear off at the worst moments, leaving him to flee naked causing nothing but trouble.

Suspicious gazes watching his every move… and even assassins from the underground student council
Thus begins Koichi and the mischievous yokai’s ridiculous, tag-team school life!


◆Characters
・Rina Kusunoki
A responsible and caring childhood friend.
She has been taking care of Koichi, who has been full of mischievous thoughts since childhood.
She performs fairly well in both academics and sports and is dedicated to volleyball.

・Iori Mitsumine
A serious and well-behaved student, but an inflexible disciplinary committee member from the neighboring class.
She often clashes with Koichi, who is a troublemaker.
Busy with committee duties, she is not part of any club.

・Mayu Watarase
A bright, energetic, and athletically gifted second-year student.
She is a member of the student council and enjoys teasing Koichi as a hobby.
She has a strong aversion to studying and is on the verge of repeating a year.

・Yuzuha Shinomori
A calm and graceful third-year student with a traditional Japanese beauty, serving as the student council president.
She finds Koichi amusing, approving the establishment of the photography club.
However, to those close to her, like Mayu, she has a terrifying side that can silence them with a single word.

・Koichi Osaka
The protagonist, whose hobby is photography.
After being in a traffic accident, he gains the ability to see yokai and acquires transformation powers.
He has some skill in photography, having won an award in a competition.
